titles.title: A bill to require manufacturers of drugs to post the names of the countries in which their drugs are manufactured on their internet websites.
Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018
Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018
Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
